entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
